translation.Message_0_Page_0: I do indeed sell medical supplies.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: <color=legendary>Colonel Jourdan</color> has ordered me to give you discounts and access to extended stock.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: We have plenty of supplies now, so we don't have to be overly cautious with them.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: So, feel free to buy something.
translation.Message_1_Page_0: I do sell meddical supplies. But...
translation.Message_1_Page_1: We are running low on supplies.
translation.Message_1_Page_2: I'm only allowed to sell you basic supplies as well. <color=legendary>Colonel Jourdan</color>'s orders.
